_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_HEIGHT_HEADER_: The height of the HTML block
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_HEIGHT_DESCRIPTION_:
Parameter: height

If this height is exceeded, a button will be shown
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_OPEN_DEFAULT_HEADER_: All text is displayed by default
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_BTN_TEXT_DESCRIPTION_:
Parameters: btn-text-more, btn-text-less

It is possible to customize texts for the button
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_BTN_ICONS_DESCRIPTION:
Parameters: btn-icon-left-less, btn-icon-right-less, btn-icon-left-more, btn-icon-right-more

You can customize the icons for the button
_A_SHOW_MORE_GROUP_BTN_CLASS_DESCRIPTION:
Parameters: btn-class, btn-parent-class

It is possible to customize CSS for the button and its parent.
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_ICON_LEFT_LESS_DESCRIPT: Left side icon for 'Show less' button
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_ICON_LEFT_MORE_DESCRIPT: Left side icon for 'Show more' button
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_ICON_RIGHT_LESS_DESCRIP: Right side icon for 'Show less' button
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_ICON_RIGHT_MORE_DESCRIP: Right side icon for 'Show more' button
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_PARENT_CLASS_DESCRIPTIO: CSS class for parent button tag
_A_SHOW_MORE_BTN_TITLE_PLACEMENT_DESCRIP: Title placement for the button, only works when is-btn-title-html is true
_A_SHOW_MORE_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The 'AShowMore' component makes it possible to hide part of the content of a web page and show it when needed.
_A_SHOW_MORE_HEIGHT_DESCRIPTION_: The height of the HTML block, if this height is exceeded, a button will be shown
_A_SHOW_MORE_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: HTML to be shown inside the component
_A_SHOW_MORE_IS_OPEN_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: All text is shown by default
_A_SHOW_MORE_SLOT_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION_: Content to be displayed within the component
_A_SHOW_MORE_TOGGLE_DESCRIPTION_: Triggers when a button is pressed, ({ isOpen }) => {}
